mapper.select: SELECT a.EMP_NO, a.KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 a

SELECT a.EMP_NO,a.KOR_NM,a.JIKGUP_CD,b.LEVEL2_NM AS JIKGUP_NM,a.JIKCHK_CD, c.LEVEL2_NM AS JIKCHK_NM,DEPT_NM FROM T_HM1000 a JOIN T_SC9100 b ON a.JIKGUP_CD=b.LEVEL2_CD JOIN T_SC9100 c ON a.JIKCHK_CD=c.LEVEL2_CD JOIN T_SC1010 d ON a.DEPT_CD=d.DEPT_CD WHERE b.LEVEL1_CD='110' AND c.LEVEL1_CD='120' AND a.EMP_NO=#{EMP_NO}
